cause.description:
Since 1493, Puerto Rico has been a colony, first under the Spanish Crown, and since 1898, a colony of the United States of America. It is time for Puerto Rico to realize its dream of finally having a say in our future.
1. Puerto Rico has the right of self-determination.
2. Puerto Rico has all necessary qualities to be the 51st State.
cause.name: Statehood for Puerto Rico
